title: Itinerary üìù
description: A well-planned itinerary is the blueprint for a smooth and enjoyable trip. It helps you maximize your time and ensure you cover all your must-see spots without feeling rushed.
sentences: A good itinerary balances planned activities with free time for spontaneous exploration.
Group attractions by location to save time and travel costs.
Factor in travel time between different points of interest.
Keep a digital copy of your itinerary accessible on your phone.
Be realistic about what you can cover in a day.
dos: Share your itinerary with someone back home.
Check the opening and closing times of attractions.
Have a backup plan in case of bad weather or unexpected closures.
donts: Don't pack too much into a single day.
Don't follow your itinerary too rigidly; allow for spontaneity.
Avoid planning activities on your arrival and departure days.
Don't forget to account for meals and rest.
